::Ramulus/Firearm/Proto/Smokescreen/Slayer::

Ramulus' eyes narrow as he watches Prebon walk away from Spears. This was 
perfect... A slightly non-Maximal plan formed into his head in a second.

As soon as Prebon stepped away, Ramulus' hand went to the anti-chip weapon at 
his waist, pulling it out faster than the optic could see and firing it at 
Spears.

"ATTACK! Try to take the leader!" he yells into his comm as a green beam 
emerges from the weapon, along with a chip, both heading for Spears at a high 
speed.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hearing the command, Firearm instantly dives toward Prebon, his arm cannon 
set on charge launcher and firing at Prebon, his optics firing as well.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Smokescreen jumps up from his crawling position as he hears Ramulus' orders, 
pulling out his heavy-fire rifle and firing three shots at Prebon's chest.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Proto, being a bit further away and not in range of fire, flies forward, 
getting closer to Prebon's location.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Slayer growls as he hears weaponfire, activating his comm-link again.

"Has she stabbed him," he asks into his comm, speaking quickly, "Should I 
attack, Master?"
